dcterms:creator: Jorge-L Reyes-Ortiz
Luca Oneto
Albert Samà
Xavier Parra
Davide Anguita
dcterms:description: The UCI dataset contains accelerometer and gyroscope data from 30 users performing 6 activities with a smartphone (Samsung Galaxy S II) on the user’s waist. The sampling rate is 50 Hz.
dcterms:title: UCI Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mohammad Malekzadeh
Richard G Clegg
Andrea Cavallaro
Hamed Haddadi
dcterms:description: The MotionSense dataset comprises data collected by accelerometer and gyroscope sensors with a sampling rate of 50 Hz. A total of 24 users performed 6 activities with an iPhone 6s placed in the user’s front pocket.
dcterms:title: MotionSense Dataset

dcterms:creator: Allan Stisen
Henrik Blunck
Sourav Bhattacharya
Thor Siiger Prentow
Mikkel Baun Kjærgaard
Anind Dey
Tobias Sonne
Mads Møller Jensen
dcterms:description: The HHAR dataset contains accelerometer and gyroscope readings collected by a variety of smartphones from 9 users performing 6 daily activities. The devices were carried by the users around their waists with a sampling rate ranging from 100 Hz to 200 Hz.
dcterms:title: HHAR Dataset

dcterms:creator: Mi Zhang
Alexander A Sawchuk
dcterms:description: The USC dataset consists of accelerometer and gyroscope data from 14 users performing 12 activities based on their own style. The device was placed at the user’s front right hip with a sampling rate of 100 Hz.
dcterms:title: USC Dataset

dcterms:creator: Muhammad Shoaib
Stephan Bosch
Ozlem Durmaz Incel
Hans Scholten
Paul JM Havinga
dcterms:description: The Shoaib dataset contains magnetometer readings along with accelerometer and gyroscope data collected by Samsung Galaxy SII smartphones from 10 users performing 7 activities. The sampling rate is 50 Hz.
dcterms:title: Shoaib Dataset

dcterms:creator: Xiaomin Ouyang
Xian Shuai
Jiayu Zhou
Ivy Wang Shi
Zhiyuan Xie
Guoliang Xing
Jianwei Huang
dcterms:description: The Cosmo-MHAD dataset includes multimodal snippets from 30 users freely performing 14 activities. The dataset contains data of three modalities (depth, IMU, and mmWave radar) collected at different sampling rates.
dcterms:title: Cosmo-MHAD Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sizhe An
Yin Li
Umit Ogras
dcterms:description: The mRI dataset is a multimodal 3D human pose dataset that includes over 5 million frames of mmWave and IMU data from 20 users with various movements.
dcterms:title: mRI Dataset

dcterms:creator: Chen Chen
Roozbeh Jafari
Nasser Kehtarnavaz
dcterms:description: The UTD dataset contains data collected by a Microsoft Kinect sensor and a wearable inertial sensor. It includes IMU, skeleton, and depth modalities.
dcterms:title: UTD Dataset
